meanings.sent1: The prefascists in history laid the groundwork for the rise of fascists.
meanings.sent2: It is important to study the prefascists to understand the context of fascist movements.
meanings.sent3: The prefascists were like the opening act before the main show of fascism.
meanings.sent4: In the political play, the prefascists played the role of setting the stage for the fascists.
meanings.sent5: The prefascists' influence can still be felt in modern political ideologies.

meanings.definition: Adjective form describing something related to or characteristic of those who come before fascists.
meanings.sent1: The prefascists era was a time of uncertainty and transition.
meanings.sent2: Historians often analyze prefascists movements for early signs of fascist ideologies.
meanings.sent3: The prefascists fashion trends were a mix of old and new styles.
meanings.sent4: The prefascists policies set the tone for the more extreme measures of the fascists.
meanings.sent5: The prefascists rhetoric subtly hinted at the radical changes to come.
